message: The subscriber having the email address "{email}" has been successfully updated in the "{listName}" list!
Whether to enable smart opens tracking. The system will learn based on various rule sets and will not record actions matching these rules. Works only when open tracking is enabled.
Whether to enable smart click tracking. The system will learn based on various rule sets and will not record actions matching these rules. Works only when click tracking is enabled.
